project_abstract.cdata: The Agricultural Research, Extension and Training Project objective will be to improve crop production in the irrigated subsector through improvements in research, extension and training. Over a 6-year period, the project will strengthen the technological base required for higher production, reform the subsector extension system, and upgrade the skills of field personnel.  The project will (a) rehabilitate and strengthen agricultural research at five regional stations in the irrigation areas; (b) upgrade the skills of field inspectors and establish programmed extension services at New Halfa and Rahad Corporations; (c) strengthen the National Extension Administration; and (d) strengthen the in-service training capabilities of the University of Gezira.
